thread.title: Gulf Air Slashes Larnaca Fares with July Booking PromoTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Gulf Air Slashes Larnaca Fares with July Booking PromoTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Gulf Air Slashes Larnaca Fares with July Booking PromoTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Gulf Air Slashes Larnaca Fares with July Booking Promo Published on : Tuesday, July 14, 2015
Gulf Air is slashing fares on its 06 weekly flights to and from Larnaca for early bird travelers booking flights this month across the airline’s Middle East and Asia network for travel in November 2015 with return Economy Class fares starting from as low as EUR330 to Kuwait, EUR450 to Bombay and EUR550 to Bangkok.
Boasting one of the Middle East’s largest networks with double daily flights to over ten cities in the Arabian Gulf region, Gulf Air is well-positioned to connect Larnaca to several key destinations in the Middle East and Asia with excellent connectivity via its efficient Bahrain International Airport hub.
Source:- Gulf Air
